Silver Star Observatory

Welcome to Silver Star Observatory

This section of the website is dedicated to providing comprehensive information about the Silver Star, a special collectible in Make a Good Mega Man Level 3 (MaGMML 3). Whether you're a new player looking to understand its purpose or a completionist aiming to collect them all, this website serves as your ultimate resource.

If you're new, I advise you to check out the Introduction page to learn more about MaGMML 3 and how Silver Stars fit into the game. Otherwise, head over to the Silver Star page for full details on their locations and how to obtain them.

Happy hunting Star Seeker! And may your heart not descend into madness as mine does on this journey.
